attributes.action: Save the famous HMS Caroline, before she goes for scrap.
attributes.additional_details:
The HMS Caroline has been de-commisioned and is no longer used by the Sea Cadets, due to the condition of the ship, it's estimated to cost £5,0000.00
(5 million GBP) to renovate, please sign petition to save the "old Lady", she's almost 100 yrs old and should be preserved as a Heritage Memorial.
Thank you one & all.
James H Robinson
